    • Constructor Detail

      • HistogramIndex

        public HistogramIndex(java.lang.String folderLocation,
                      char histogramType,
                      int binNumber)
        Construct an index taking all images contained in the given folder, using given histogram type and bin number.
        Parameters:
        folderLocation - the folder where images to index are located
        histogramType - the type of histogram ('G':Gray level based;'C':Color level based)
        binNumber - the number of bins to use (the precision)

    • Method Detail

        Serialize the index into a file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name where the index will be saved

      • search

        public SearchResult[] search(Histogram histoRef)
        Compare a given histogram with all histograms contained in the index, and return an array ordered with closest histogram first.
        Parameters:
        histoRef - the histogram to compare
        Returns:
        an ordered array of SearchResult

      • search

        public SearchResult[] search(Histogram histoRef,
                             int k)
        Compare a given histogram with all histograms contained in the index, and return an array ordered with closest histogram containing k results.
        Parameters:
        histoRef - the histogram to compare
        k - the number of result wanted
        Returns:
        an ordered array of k SearchResult
